title: 401 Unauthorized Access while using Twilio's Programmable Chat
body:
I am trying to create an iOS chat application using Twilio's Programmable Chat. I am able to retrieve the token from Twilio by passing device token and identity, but I am getting the 401 unauthorized Access while loading the channels(if any). I have checked my Twilio credentials

TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID 
TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN 
TWILIO_API_KEY
TWILIO_API_SECRET 
TWILIO_IPM_SERVICE_SID

and all of them are assigned properly.

Few Notes to consider before answering this thread :

  1. I have set up my server properly and I am doing ngrok also.
  2. I am using node.js for server setup.
